soot.jimple.infoflow.aliasing

Class PtsBasedAliasStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • soot.jimple.infoflow.aliasing.AbstractAliasStrategy
      • soot.jimple.infoflow.aliasing.AbstractBulkAliasStrategy
        • soot.jimple.infoflow.aliasing.PtsBasedAliasStrategy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAliasingStrategy

    public class PtsBasedAliasStrategy
extends AbstractBulkAliasStrategy
    A simple points-to-based aliasing strategy for FlowDroid
    Author:
    Steven Arzt

    • Method Detail

      • computeAliasTaints

        public void computeAliasTaints(Abstraction d1,
                               soot.jimple.Stmt src,
                               soot.Value targetValue,
                               java.util.Set<Abstraction> taintSet,
                               soot.SootMethod method,
                               Abstraction newAbs)
        Description copied from interface: IAliasingStrategy
        Computes the taints for the aliases of a given tainted variable
        Parameters:
        d1 - The context in which the variable has been tainted
        src - The statement that tainted the variable
        targetValue - The target value which has been tainted
        taintSet - The set to which all generated alias taints shall be added
        method - The method containing src
        newAbs - The newly generated abstraction for the variable taint

      • computeAliasTaintsInternal

      • injectCallingContext

        public void injectCallingContext(Abstraction abs,
                                 IInfoflowSolver fSolver,
                                 soot.SootMethod callee,
                                 soot.Unit callSite,
                                 Abstraction source,
                                 Abstraction d1)
        Description copied from interface: IAliasingStrategy
        Notifies the aliasing strategy that a method has been called in the taint analysis. This may be helpful for interprocedural alias analyses.
        Parameters:
        abs - The abstraction on the callee's start unit
        fSolver - The forward solver propagating the taints
        callee - The callee
        callSite - The call site
        source - The abstraction at the call site
        d1 - The abstraction at the caller method's entry point

      • isFlowSensitive

        public boolean isFlowSensitive()
        Description copied from interface: IAliasingStrategy
        Gets whether this aliasing strategy is flow sensitive
        Returns:
        True if the aliasing strategy is flow sensitive, otherwise false

      • requiresAnalysisOnReturn

        public boolean requiresAnalysisOnReturn()
        Description copied from interface: IAliasingStrategy
        Gets whether this algorithm requires the analysis to be triggered again when returning from a callee.
        Returns:
        True if the alias analysis must be triggered again when returning from a method, otherwise false
